subject: Rajasthan History
topic: Pramukh Rajvansh: Guhil-Sisodia (Mewar), Pratihar aur Chauhan
question_en: Who was the founder of the Guhila dynasty of Mewar?
question_hi: मेवाड़ के गुहिला राजवंश के संस्थापक कौन थे?
explanation_en: Bappa Rawal was the founder of the Guhila dynasty of Mewar.
explanation_hi: बप्पा रावल मेवाड़ के गुहिला राजवंश के संस्थापक थे।

subject: Rajasthan History
topic: Pramukh Rajvansh: Guhil-Sisodia (Mewar), Pratihar aur Chauhan
question_en: Which ruler is famous for constructing the 'Nagda Temple' in Rajasthan?
question_hi: राजस्थान में 'नागदा मंदिर' के निर्माण के लिए कौन सा शासक प्रसिद्ध है?
explanation_en: Maharana Lakha is famous for constructing the 'Nagda Temple' in Rajasthan.
explanation_hi: महाराणा लाखा राजस्थान में 'नागदा मंदिर' के निर्माण के लिए प्रसिद्ध है।

subject: Rajasthan History
topic: Pramukh Rajvansh: Guhil-Sisodia (Mewar), Pratihar aur Chauhan
question_en: Who was the most famous ruler of the Pratihar dynasty?
question_hi: प्रतिहार राजवंश के सबसे प्रसिद्ध शासक कौन थे?
explanation_en: Mihir Bhoj was the most famous ruler of the Pratihar dynasty.
explanation_hi: मिहिर भोज प्रतिहार राजवंश के सबसे प्रसिद्ध शासक थे।

subject: Rajasthan History
topic: Pramukh Rajvansh: Guhil-Sisodia (Mewar), Pratihar aur Chauhan
question_en: Who was the founder of the Chauhan dynasty?
question_hi: चौहान राजवंश के संस्थापक कौन थे?
explanation_en: Trinetra was the founder of the Chauhan dynasty.
explanation_hi: त्रिनेत्र चौहान राजवंश के संस्थापक थे।

subject: Rajasthan History
topic: Pramukh Rajvansh: Guhil-Sisodia (Mewar), Pratihar aur Chauhan
question_en: Rana Pratap was a ruler of which dynasty?
question_hi: राणा प्रताप किस राजवंश के शासक थे?
explanation_en: Rana Pratap was a ruler of the Sisodia dynasty.
explanation_hi: राणा प्रताप सिसोदिया राजवंश के शासक थे।

subject: Rajasthan History
topic: Pramukh Rajvansh: Guhil-Sisodia (Mewar), Pratihar aur Chauhan
question_en: Who built the 'Kumbhalgarh Fort' in Rajasthan?
question_hi: राजस्थान में 'कुंभलगढ़ किला' का निर्माण किसने करवाया था?
explanation_en: Rana Kumbha built the 'Kumbhalgarh Fort' in Rajasthan.
explanation_hi: राणा कुंभा ने राजस्थान में 'कुंभलगढ़ किला' का निर्माण करवाया था।

subject: Rajasthan History
topic: Pramukh Rajvansh: Guhil-Sisodia (Mewar), Pratihar aur Chauhan
question_en: The famous 'Chittor Fort' in Rajasthan was built by which ruler?
question_hi: राजस्थान में प्रसिद्ध 'चित्तौड़ किला' का निर्माण किस शासक ने करवाया था?
explanation_en: The famous 'Chittor Fort' in Rajasthan was built by Bappa Rawal.
explanation_hi: राजस्थान में प्रसिद्ध 'चित्तौड़ किला' का निर्माण बप्पा रावल ने करवाया था।

subject: Rajasthan History
topic: Pramukh Rajvansh: Guhil-Sisodia (Mewar), Pratihar aur Chauhan
question_en: Who was the famous ruler of the Mewar region?
question_hi: मेवाड़ क्षेत्र के प्रसिद्ध शासक कौन थे?
explanation_en: All of the above were famous rulers of the Mewar region.
explanation_hi: उपरोक्त सभी मेवाड़ क्षेत्र के प्रसिद्ध शासक थे।

subject: Rajasthan History
topic: Pramukh Rajvansh: Guhil-Sisodia (Mewar), Pratihar aur Chauhan
question_en: The 'Pratihar' dynasty was also known as:
question_hi: प्रतिहार राजवंश को और क्या नाम से जाना जाता था?
explanation_en: The 'Pratihar' dynasty was also known as the 'Matsya Dynasty'.
explanation_hi: प्रतिहार राजवंश को 'मत्स्य राजवंश' के नाम से भी जाना जाता था।

subject: Rajasthan History
topic: Pramukh Rajvansh: Guhil-Sisodia (Mewar), Pratihar aur Chauhan
question_en: Who was the famous queen of the Chauhan dynasty?
question_hi: चौहान राजवंश की प्रसिद्ध रानी कौन थीं?
explanation_en: Padmavati was the famous queen of the Chauhan dynasty.
explanation_hi: पद्मावती चौहान राजवंश की प्रसिद्ध रानी थीं।
